text: Bernardo San Juan (born 12 March 1924) is a Filipino former sports shooter. He competed at the 1960, 1964 and 1968 Summer Olympics and 1966 Asian Games. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Filipino male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of the Philippines Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rizal Category:Asian Games medalists in shooting Category:Shooters at the 1966 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for the Philippines Category:Medalists at the 1966 Asian Games
title: Bernardo San Juan
